title: Is an Unconstitutional Climate Emergency Coming This Week? | Guests: Rep. Ronny Jackson & Tommy Robinson | 7/19/22
description:
Is a national climate change emergency coming? Radical leftist groups are freaking out over summer weather, prompting them to demand President Biden start taking executive action to implement climate policies. Rep. Ronny Jackson (R-Texas), author of "Holding the Line" and former White House doctor who spent years around Biden, joins to share his concerns about Biden's cognitive abilities. Glenn reads two recent articles to showcase the media's attack on faith and God. Glenn and Pat discuss how the Democrats are attempting to radically change the country. They give an update on America’s ever-worsening border crisis. Independent journalist Tommy Robinson joins to expose the horrific cover-up of young girls being sexually abused in Telford, England.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
